Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder by Special Category/Immune System and Related Disorders/Immune System Disorder/Erythema Multiforme
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Erythema/Erythema Multiforme
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Vesiculobullous/Erythema Multiforme
Record.Description: A skin and mucous membrane disease characterized by an eruption of macules, papules, nodules, vesicles, and/or bullae with characteristic "bull's-eye" lesions usually occurring on the dorsal aspect of the hands and forearms.
